pillarDesc: This pillar focuses on the daily nutrition that support your health and wellbeing
imageAlt: An image of a glass of water and an apple representing the Eat pillar

toDo.list2: Eat vegetables spanning the rainbow colours
toDo.list3: Eat within a 12 hour window (to encourage micro-fasting)
toDo.list4: Drink at least 250ml glasses of water
toDo.list5: Avoid processed foods (those containing more than 5 ingredients and excessive preservatives)

pillarDesc: This pillar focuses on the daily physical activities and movements that support your health and wellbeing
imageAlt: An icon of a heart beating to represent the Move pillar

toDo.list2: Do 1 of 2 strength trainings this week
toDo.list3: Do 1 of 2 10 minute HIIT this week

pillarDesc: This pillar focuses on the daily relaxation and mindfulness activities that support your health and wellbeing
imageAlt: An icon of a music player and headphones representing relaxation and the Relax pillar

toDo.list1: Take at least 15 minutes of 'me' time
toDo.list5: Eat a meal distraction- and device-free

pillarDesc: This pillar focuses on the daily sleep and rest activities that support your health and wellbeing
imageAlt: An icon of a bed representing the Sleep pillar

toDo.list1: Keep bedroom dark and put devices away/off
toDo.list2: Spend 20 minutes outside in the morning
toDo.list4: Minimise any highly emotional issues/conversations before bed
